name: Doraju
description:
Stomp through the city as Doraju, a giant monster, as the military tries to kill you!

This game was inspired by the Godzilla series

Ver 0.1 Notes

This is just the foundation of the game and there's a lot to be added still for when I finished the full version of the game at the projected goal of November. I'll be keeping the game as updated as possible as I add more things to it. The menu screens are placeholders at the moment and some sprites will definitely be changed as time progresses. I would like as much constructive feedback as possible so if I need to I can change things as early as possible. I hope you enjoy the game and please leave a comment telling me your experience of the game, Thank You!
